Mohammed Husain UI/UX Designer

About Me Portfolio Resume

Who Am I?

Hi there! I'm Mo, an aspiring UI/UX Designer. I recently graduated from Georgia Tech with a BS in Computer Science. My focus is in Human-Computer Interaction and Media Creation. I'm particularly interested in UI/UX, fluid graphics, and game design. When not programming or designing, you can find me gaming, exploring fountain pens, surfing Reddit, or building a pc! Check out some of my past work below.

Design

Sure software is important for design, but what's even more important? The user. A good user experience stems from the user, so that's where I start!

Oh also I love messing around in Sketch and reading about user research.

Code

Most of my experience has been on the front-end. From digital design to final implementation, I've learned to learn and made it a mission to keep challenging myself -- I'm not stopping anytime soon!

Fun

When I've got some time to myself my go-to is Reddit, where I can explore my vastly different interests. On the side I collect playing cards and fountain pens -- budget permitting. I'm an avid gamer, which I show myself every day.

I've even hit the top tiers of more than a few competitive games!

Previous Work

Georgia Tech AKPsi Family Tree

  • D3.js
  • Observable
  • Blockbuilder

The whole known big-little tree (300+ people) for Georgia Tech's chapter of Alpha Kappa Psi, GT's premier co-ed business fraternity. Created using D3.js with Observable + Blockbuilder.

I manually collected the data through Google Forms and private messaging to flesh out the most accurate and up-to-date family tree.

Check it out

Beatmaster

  • Unity
  • Sketch
  • Unity Ads

Rhythm based super-casual game (ie. Timberman/Flappy Bird/etc.) Beats appear on a never-ending track that increases in speed over time.

Hit beats by tapping when crossing them! Track getting too fast? Slow down time by pressing on the left side of the screen, but be careful! You can only slow down time for so long... Play normally to regenerate the hourglass skill!
